Texts.Chs: <译文: 我们处于战争状态。我们不知道^red;<未知>^reset;是谁，也不知道他们从哪里来，但他们是一个恐怖至极的种族。他们不存在道德观念(也许他们甚至不理解这个概念) ，我们的人民所遭受的暴行无以形容...无法想象。>
Texts.Eng: <Translation: We are at war. We have no idea who ^red;<unknown>^reset; are or where they came from, but they are a truly horrible race. Their sense of morality is non-existent (perhaps they don't even understand the concept), and the unspeakable atrocities carried out on our people...unimaginable.>

Texts.Chs: <^red;<未知>^reset;声称他们来了。他警告我们他们的起源地。我们嘲笑他。我们监禁了他。我们以叛国罪判处他死刑。但他是对的。我们应该听他的。现在... 现在我们都得死。>
Texts.Eng: <^red;<unknown>^reset; claimed they were coming. He warned us of their point of origin. We mocked him. We imprisoned him. We sentenced him to death for treason. But he was right. We should have listened. Now....now we all die.>

Texts.Chs: <^red;<未知>^reset;，我们最尊敬的将军，在战斗中阵亡了。没有他的头脑，我仍然不确定我们将如何取得胜利，即使我们最近发现了^red;<未知>^reset;技术。我们最危险的武器似乎只是这些可憎之物的一个烦恼。>
Texts.Eng: <^red;<unknown>^reset;, our most revered General, has fallen in battle. Without his mind, I remain uncertain on how we will achieve victory even with our recent discovery of the ^red;<unknown>^reset; technology. Our most dangerous weapons appear to be a mere annoyance to these abominations.>
